ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: I spend a lot of my free time doing music-related activities.
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: I sometimes choose music that can trigger shivers down my spine.
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: I enjoy writing about music, for example on blogs and forums.
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: If somebody starts singing a song I don't know, I can usually join in.
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: I am able to judge whether someone is a good singer or not.
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: I can sing or play music from memory.
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: I usually know when I'm hearing a song for the first time.
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: I'm intrigued by musical styles I'm not familiar with and want to find out more.
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: Pieces of music rarely evoke emotions for me. (Reverse Scored)
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: I am able to hit the right notes when I sing along with a recording.
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: I find it difficult to spot mistakes in a performance of a song even if I know the tune. (Reverse Scored)
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: I can compare and discuss differences between two performances or versions of the same piece of music.
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: I have trouble recognizing a familiar song when played in a different way or by a different performer. (Reverse Scored)
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: I have never been complimented for my talents as a musical performer. (Reverse Scored)
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: I often read or search the internet for things related to music.
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: I often pick certain music to motivate or excite me.
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: I am not able to sing in harmony when somebody is singing a familiar tune. (Reverse Scored)
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: I can tell when people sing or play out of time with the beat.
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: I am able to identify what is special about a given musical piece.
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: I am able to talk about the emotions that a piece of music evokes for me.
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: I don't spend much of my disposable income on music. (Reverse Scored)
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: I can tell when people sing or play out of tune.
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: When I sing, I have no idea whether I'm in tune or not. (Reverse Scored)
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: Music is kind of an addiction for me - I couldn't live without it.
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: I don't like singing in public because I'm afraid that I would sing wrong notes. (Reverse Scored)
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: When I hear a piece of music I can usually identify its genre.
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: I would not consider myself a musician. (Reverse Scored)
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: I keep track of new music that I come across (e.g. new artists or recordings).
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: After hearing a new song two or three times, I can usually sing it by myself.
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: I only need to hear a new tune once and I can sing it back hours later.
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: Music can evoke my memories of past people and places.
Notes: 1 = Completely Disagree; 2 = Strongly Disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5 = Agree; 6; Strongly Agree; 7 = Completely Agree

ElementDescription: I engaged in regular, daily practice of a musical instrument (including voice) for _______ years.
At the peak of my interest, I practiced _______  hours per day on my primary instrument.
I have attended _______ live music events as an audience member in the past twelve months.
I have had formal training in music theory for _______ years.
I have had _______ years of formal training on a musical instrument (including voice) during my lifetime.
I can play _______ musical instruments.
I listen attentively to music for _______ per day.
Notes: 1 = 0 - 15 min; 2 = 15 - 30 min; 3 = 30 - 60 min; 4 = 60 - 90 min; 5 = 2 hours; 6 = 2 - 3 hours; 7 = 4 hours more

ElementDescription: The instrument I play best (including voice) is _______
Goldsmiths Musical Sophistication - Active Engagement Normalized Score
Notes: Sum of items 1, 3, 8, 15, 21(reverse scored), 24, 28, 34, 38

ElementDescription: Goldsmiths Musical Sophistication - Perceptual Abilities Normalized Score
Notes: Sum of items 5, 6, 11(reverse scored), 12, 13(reverse scored), 18, 22, 23(reverse scored), 26

ElementDescription: Goldsmiths Musical Sophistication - Music Training Normalized Score
Notes: Sum of items 14(reverse scored), 27(reverse scored), 32, 33, 35, 36, 37

ElementDescription: Goldsmiths Musical Sophistication - Singing Abilities Normalized Score
Notes: Sum of items 4, 7, 10, 17(reverse scored), 25(reverse scored), 29, 30

ElementDescription: Goldsmiths Musical Sophistication - Emotions Normalized Score
Notes: Sum of items 2, 9(reverse scored), 16, 19, 20, 31

ElementDescription: General Sophistication Normalized Score
Notes: Sum of items 1, 3, 4, 7, 10, 12, 14(reverse scored), 15, 17(reverse scored), 19, 23(reverse scored), 24, 25(reverse scored), 27(reverse scored), 29, 32, 33, 37
